verbose_text: From stage 47, NO donors increase the probability of occurrence of fictive swimming episodes and thus promote increased locomotor activity, although without significantly affecting either the duration of individual episodes or the duration and frequency of motor bursts within episodes (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG and XREF_TABLE).
